00030 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_LUBYK_RECURSIVE_MUTEX_H_
00031 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_LUBYK_RECURSIVE_MUTEX_H_
00032 #include <pthread.h>
00033 #include <assert.h>
00034 #include <cstdio>
00035 #include <string.h> // strerror
00036 
00037 #include "lubyk/mutex.h"
00038 #include "lubyk/non_copyable.h"

00040 namespace lubyk {

00044 class RMutex : private NonCopyable
00045 {
00046   Mutex mutex_;
00047   int counter_;
00048   pthread_t owner_;
00049 public:
00050   RMutex()
00051    : counter_(0),
00052      owner_(NULL) {}
00053 
00054   ~RMutex() {}
00055 
00059   inline void lock() {
00060     pthread_t id = pthread_self();
00061     if (owner_ == id) {
00062       ++counter_;
00063     } else {
00064       mutex_.lock();
00065       counter_ = 1;
00066       owner_   = id;
00067     }
00068   }
00069 
00071   inline void unlock() {
00072     if (--counter_ == 0) {
00073       owner_ = NULL;
00074       mutex_.unlock();
00075     }
00076   }
00077 
00078 protected:
00080   int lockCount() const {
00081     return counter_;
00082   }
00083 };
00084 
00090 class ScopedLock : private NonCopyable {
00091   RMutex *mutex_ptr_;
00092 public:
00093   ScopedLock(RMutex *mutex) : mutex_ptr_(mutex) {
00094     mutex_ptr_->lock();
00095   }
00096 
00097   ScopedLock(RMutex &mutex) : mutex_ptr_(&mutex) {
00098     mutex_ptr_->lock();
00099   }
00100 
00101   ~ScopedLock() {
00102     mutex_ptr_->unlock();
00103   }
00104 };
00105

00109 class ScopedUnlock : private NonCopyable
00110 {
00111   RMutex *mutex_ptr_;
00112 public:
00113   ScopedUnlock(RMutex *mutex) : mutex_ptr_(mutex) {
00114     mutex_ptr_->unlock();
00115   }
00116 
00117   ScopedUnlock(RMutex &mutex) : mutex_ptr_(&mutex) {
00118     mutex_ptr_->unlock();
00119   }
00120 
00121   ~ScopedUnlock() {
00122     mutex_ptr_->lock();
00123   }
00124 };
